items.sentence: Tom and Mary gave identical answers on the test, a fact which made the teacher suspicious.
When I leaned over to look at the fish, my phone fell out of my pocket and into the water.
I think that my French would be much better today if my teacher had been a native speaker.
Most people studying a foreign language will never be able to speak like a native speaker.
The names of the students who failed in the examination were posted on the bulletin board.
